name: primiparous
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
producing a child or young animal for the first time, or having produced only one child or young animal: The sample consisted of children of primiparous mothers recruited while receiving prenatal care. There are two ways to help primiparous cows: early breeding and early weaning. Compare
multiparous
More examplesFewer examplesThey evaluated the emotional health of primiparous women.Where elephant seals had not been hunted for 20 years, the average age of primiparous females was 6 years.Study 1 had 36 primiparous and 40 multiparous Holstein cows.
